channel.title: Comments on: Stepping Outside the Comfort Zone
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: Stepping outside of your comfort zone should be a pre-requisite to any IT job, frankly. That's how we learn and progress. Good for you on taking another step!
item.content:encoded: Stepping outside of your comfort zone should be a pre-requisite to any IT job, frankly. That’s how we learn and progress. Good for you on taking another step!

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: Maybe you should take a look at Vagrant. It lets you automate the setup of a Virtual machine.
item.content:encoded: Maybe you should take a look at Vagrant. It lets you automate the setup of a Virtual machine.

item.title: By: David Klee
item.dc:creator: David Klee
item.description: W00t! Virtualization is one of the next evolutions of the IT career, and it's amazing to be on the forefront of technology. I'm very happy to help you gain some comfort in this new extension of data science!
item.content:encoded: W00t! Virtualization is one of the next evolutions of the IT career, and it’s amazing to be on the forefront of technology. I’m very happy to help you gain some comfort in this new extension of data science!
